name: Hamekomi Lucky Puzzle Wii Returns
overview: (translated from Japanese) Easy but deep inside, that lucky puzzle is back! Move the piece that divides the rectangle into seven and put it so that it matches the shape of the silhouette ... .... Easy but profound, that lucky puzzle came home with new issues and new modes. In the process of finding the shape of the silhouette by combining pieces, flexible eyes to see thoughts and figures are tried. Even though it is simple, when you try, everyone gets crazy. It is possible to play 4 people simultaneously.
